resources.string: In order to recognize characters, Cyrilliscript needs to use\n a trained data file. Allow saving it to SD Card?

In order to use Cyrilliscript, it has to be enabled as an Input Method in the system settings. Launch the Language and Input Settings, navigate to Virtual Keyboard > Manage Keyboards to enable Cyrilliscript
Would you like to download the trained language file for
